QuestData.Title: Outplayed
QuestData.Description: Now we can strike down their leader, friend.$b$bIt just so happens that I have a large pouch of puffpetal powder right here. Why don't you take it and toss a few handfuls around the workshop floor at the top of the falls? If they are still there, I imagine they will have an... unfortunate reaction.$b$bWhile you do that I will gather the other elders and make our way to Glitterfall Basin. Speak with the Lady when your task is done.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A cruel spriggan who has disguised themselves with fae magic. Allergic to puffpetal powder.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to the Lady of the Falls.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, the hero of the hour returns! Thank you for liberating my supplies. Our grove desperately needs them in these trying times.
